chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following problem:
When I opened the package, I found a bottle of soap inside and not an iPhone.
Thank you for your help,

Hello,

My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following problem:

Here's a photo of the product, which arrived with a bottle of soap instead of my iPhone 13. Is the weight of the package consistent with the package sent from your base? I notice that several labels are applied to my package, which suggests that there might have been an exchange or theft by one of the handlers between the departure of the phone from you and arrival at the relay point.

Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The customer claims that the parcel was delivered empty. We have requested the BM certificate of non-receipt, pictures of the package, picture of the label with tracking number visible, pictures of the package inside (with the product received inside if any) and police report.


 Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents


Best regards,
Randriamboavonjy - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Please also ask the customer to keep the parcel as the courier may need to collect it for investigation purposes.

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

You can see the documents sent by the customer in the details of the service.

He wants a refund.
Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Randriamboavonjy Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Please ask the customer to print out the CND and fill up the details using a pen. Our logistics partner is unable to accept this CND as they do not deem it valid if it is not handwritten. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Hello ecomobile,

I've just sent you the document you requested from the customer. 

As the deadline specified in our quality charter has passed, we will be refunding the customer. 

Kind regards, 
Fanomezantsoa from the Back Market team.

Dear Backcare,

The refund request has been processed. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
